website_summaries.verdict: A 2-line expandable phone system that includes one corded base and one DECT cordless handset.
pros: Features intercom capability between handsets, 60 minutes of digital recording time, call waiting, and caller ID
The phone system can be expanded up to 10 cordless handsets
cons: Expensive option may be better for corporate use

customer_reviews.title: Not Connecting to the Other Phones
customer_reviews.text: We got two Sets including a desktop and cordless phone, which each individual phone connects with its cordless handset but the two phones themselves don't connect properly. Also if you are on line 2 and line 1 and line 1 is hung up, it hangs up line 2 also. The Last issues is if you place one phone on hold and then try and pick up the line from a different phone it's a blank line and doesnt connect. Technically these are just not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: This phone sounds like you are in a bathroom while crinkling a newspaper. Buy another phone this is horrible, I unplugged it and plugged my old phone back in.
customer_reviews.author: Ara Mesropian

customer_reviews.title: POOR SOUND QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: THE PHONE HAS A DELAY YOU HAVE TO WAIT TO SAY HELLO OR THEY WONT KNOW YOU ANSWERED YOU SOUND LIKE YOUR IN A TUNNEL TALKING BOUGHT AN EXTRA CORDLESS AND IT WONT PAIR WITH IT EVEN THOUGH ITS THE SAME CORDLESS THAT CAME WITH THE PHONE JUST WASN'T VERY IMPRESSED OR HAPPY WITH THE PURCHASE
customer_reviews.author: Minnie79

customer_reviews.title: This phone was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I had this product for a couple of months and it never worked consistently. Sometimes the phone would ring and other times it wouldnt. Same thing for the dial tone. We have had a bad experience. Our friends say we don't answer our phone.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Dudley

customer_reviews.title: This is the second base that I purchased. Both ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second base that I purchased. Both gave me trouble with the receiver. There seems to be a short where the cord connects to the receiver. I thought it was specific to the first one I purchased so I ordered another since we already had the cordless ones in place. The second one is doing the same thing. It seems to be a defect with the base.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent Phone - Not Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for a home office. Pros: The look is sleek and modern. The handset has good sound quality. Having the additional wireless is useful. Cons: The functionality of the phone leaves a lot to be desired. Navigating through the phone is cumbersome. One of the main functions I use is speaker phone. You are unable to adjust the volume and sound quality if poor. Also people have a hard time hearing me when set to speaker phone. Overall: If I could redo, I probably would look for another phone. Not the greatest phone for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Kiven80

customer_reviews.title: This system did not work as expected. There was ...
customer_reviews.text: This system did not work as expected. There was self-generated noise on Line 1 when there was no noise on the line itself. The interference wasn't acceptable and was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Tim J.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The cordless receiver is not connected to the base. It does not understand when I dial a number. It jeeps saying To complete this call dial the phone number. Terrible. Never order RCA phone system again. The base when you call it's kind of international call. Very dissatisfied. Unhappy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Felee

customer_reviews.title: love these phone
customer_reviews.text: i have 5 base units and 2 handset and i'm uussing them in my house and home office
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the old Executive Series for sure
customer_reviews.text: Seems a bit cheap. Nothing like the old Executive Series for sure!!! Should have followed the advice from another reviewer that I could get something better! If I could do it over again I would definitely get something else. It does start an echo sometimes..... Strange!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy this if you want people to hear you.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible--if you don't talk directly in the handset no one can hear you. The digital readout is so small and reflects all light so its very difficult to see. My biggest regret is not sending it back in time! I'm constantly repeating myself to people because if you don't talk into the exact place they cannot hear you. The speaker is ok, that is why I bought it but you need the handset from time to time. the blue tooth did not sync with the phone. DONT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.author: Georgia L. LaMar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone.
customer_reviews.text: A bit quirky to learn all the features, but a solid, reliable phone with excellent voice quality. My only complaint is that sometimes it may take several rings to identify a caller correctly by stored number—but that could be ATT or some other provider's fault, too. In fact, I more than half suspect that is the case, as the problem is not consistent.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Martinek

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: We use this phone in our business. We have several extra handset and have never had a problem with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Has a lot of Nice Features
customer_reviews.text: Phone has a lot of nice features and functionality and was easy to set up. We use it for our home office and there is a lot of capacity for holding voice mail messages. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K

customer_reviews.title: RCA Phones
customer_reviews.text: The worst RCA product we have ever bought...hard to understand instructions...wish they (and everyone else) would just go back to the basics. We just put it back in the box, never used it...
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great other then the portable phone the 6 will work sometimes and sometimes it won’t work
customer_reviews.author: samantha haley

customer_reviews.title: we have purchased 3 of these and within 3 months ...
customer_reviews.text: we have purchased 3 of these and within 3 months it either quits working or line 2 quits working. For this amount of money I would think it would last longer.and at that point we can not return them or exchange.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Works great - we use it as a business phone so ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great - we use it as a business phone so it gets a lot of use. I have this same one that I purchased around 10 years ago, and it's still working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Couldnt get additional hand set to link to base
customer_reviews.text: Not one of my favorite phones for sure! We ordered an additional hand set also and never could get it to link to base! Ended up just returning it!
customer_reviews.author: Carri

customer_reviews.title: Very productive
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for the office, they're great! A definite upgrade from what we had and many features!
customer_reviews.author: peggy brackins

customer_reviews.title: The phone volume goes down and its hard to listen ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone volume goes down and its hard to listen. The caller can't listen to properly and it keep cutting off. Called the customer service and they didn't do anything. Its a total money waste. I would never buy their product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price. I think it was a return or ...
customer_reviews.text: Great price. I think it was a return or a damaged package discount, but everything was there and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: GMP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome phone for the money. This is my second one I have bought! Lighting ruined the previous one!
customer_reviews.author: Jubal Williamson

customer_reviews.title: product is fine but shipping was terrible!
customer_reviews.text: The untimely shipping cost me a lot of money. purchased for business use and lost hundreds of dollars in business for each day it was late.
customer_reviews.author: erica bancroft

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This phone is horrible. Do not buy it!! It only lasted about 4 months!!

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment.
customer_reviews.text: The phones arrived on time and as guaranteed. Great equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Alwayswise

customer_reviews.title: The desktop base cord doesn't fit properly so in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The desktop base cord doesn't fit properly so in the middle of the conversation the customer will not hear me. I wish I didnt' purchase this but I unpackaged, threw away the box and now stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: BAD RECEPTION- POOR FEEDBACK FROM CALLERS. SOUNDS TERRIBLE AND SPEAKER OPTION DON'T WORK PROPERLY. CORDED LINE MAKES NO DIFFERENCE AT ALL!
customer_reviews.author: Business Owner

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for a short time but having problems with sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Ponder

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was just what we were looking for to have at work
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Lafleur

customer_reviews.title: good quality handsets
customer_reviews.text: I have this same phone system in one of my businesses, so I ordered the same one for a new business. Works very well, good quality handsets. Much cheaper on Amazon than in Office Depot
customer_reviews.author: Mc Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for small office
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our business and our secretary of very pleased. Volume is great and clarity too. And it's nice that it's expandable.
customer_reviews.author: fibs 96

customer_reviews.title: I like the phone it is my third one
customer_reviews.text: I like the phone it is my third one, the cordless unit sucks and I will be returning it if they let me.
customer_reviews.author: joel darrah

customer_reviews.title: This phone system is terrible! We ordered the extra handsets and none of ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone system is terrible! We ordered the extra handsets and none of them will register to the base. We use this phone for our business and we have had numerous amount of people ask us what the "humming" noise is in the background. Every time I have phoned RCA... the wait time is high. Hopefully we can return the system!
customer_reviews.author: lynne clark

customer_reviews.title: Line one worked for less than a week. It's ...
customer_reviews.text: Line one worked for less than a week. It's not the phone line, it's the phone. Without line one, it makes the whole system worthless. Nobody seems to care.
customer_reviews.author: Greater Texas Builders

customer_reviews.title: Be aware!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible phone dont work! Called the company and they wont do anything about it!
customer_reviews.author: Brucenebesky

customer_reviews.title: So far they are great. I had a little trouble setting them up ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a total of 5 phones (two corded and three cordless). So far they are great. I had a little trouble setting them up - but that was my fault. I made one silly mistake and plugged in both corded phone. I called for help on installing and within minutes the phone were working. Both the phones and the help line was great.
customer_reviews.author: Lonny Kronen

customer_reviews.title: 30 day warranty 2 months and phone base is junk ...
customer_reviews.text: 30 day warranty 2 months and phone base is junk have to keep unplugging to get dial tone had product before and had no problems Amazon 30 day warranty is ridiculous wont let me return to replace
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Feurer

customer_reviews.title: It was ok..... some buttons ...
customer_reviews.text: It was ok.....some buttons would not work on the phone after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Lytricia

customer_reviews.title: If you want reliable
customer_reviews.text: Have this same model in another office. Works great and is very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: great product at very fair price
customer_reviews.text: great price for simple wireless 2 line system which replaces huge hard wired multiline system I paid $3000 for 25 years ago

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to reset this twice already by pulling out the batteries

customer_reviews.title: ... voice and echos I n the background sometimes otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: has some issues with the quality of voice and echos I n the background sometimes otherwise good purchase

customer_reviews.title: Very low quality
customer_reviews.text: Voice message playback is inaudible. Line two stopped working. Then Line one started working and Line two stopped working. Then I threw it in the trash and purchased another phone.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the phone performs, but the headset plugin isn't very handy.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The phone does not work at all. Cuts in and out and handset doesn't always work.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality good, easy enough to program, screen is a little busy, delay to the remote is a pain.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worse phone ever we have had to replace it 2 times now

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this phone because after Few second you could hear echo in the phone

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The hands-free speaker does not function properly. It works with some calls and not with others.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Need another handset and the cordless phone is a bit fuzzy.

customer_reviews.title: So so.
customer_reviews.text: Not a good office phone. It has more of a home phone feel.

customer_reviews.title: good but not great
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately the main base is not cordless which is what i needed also needed additional cordless units.. will look to order what i need now

customer_reviews.title: Line 2 Didnt Work
customer_reviews.text: Line 2 Would Not Work. Order New Phone From Different Seller Now Having Shipping Issues, Hopefully When We Receive New Phones This Unit Will Work.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone System for the Money
customer_reviews.text: It serves the needs of my small business and is loaded with all the bells and whistles I need for my small business.
customer_reviews.author: William Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Very Good phone..almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with it so far..(30 days) I use it for dispatching from home. If you need a phone for 10 people in an office this phone might not be for you, but if you need it for 1-3 people and 2 lines it's perfect. the only thing i wish was different on this phone is that...answering machine ON or OFF would be done with a quick push of a button and not by going through about 4,5 pushes from the menu.. Other than that, i have not found anything to complain about yet...
customer_reviews.author: Suren

customer_reviews.title: Twice BAD
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for the design, set up cordless worked fine, vast phone never worked, returned received another, same problem..piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Phone did not work with other handset. My original phone failed so I bought this one think it would work with the handset I already owned, I did not.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: RCA 2 Line Corded/Cordless Expandable Phone
customer_reviews.text: Overall the base phone and 10 expandable handsets are good. My medical office's problem was that the sound on the answering machine is far too loud and cannot be muted. We needed to be able to keep what's said on the answering machine quiet while conversing with someone else face to face. We had to buy another 2 line answering machine phone and turn off the answering machine on this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Customer service for RCA sux but the phone is very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Tarsha

customer_reviews.title: RCA Corded Phone
customer_reviews.text: Speaker phone volume and clarity were good, but hand set microphone volume was bad (callers could not hear me when I used the hand set). Caller ID display showed the incorrect number for many in-coming calls. After an unsuccessful call to RCA, I sent the phoine back.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfman

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Bad news product - the DECT 6.0 is spotty and does cover 300 feet as promised, the system is user unfriendly. Also, if you want to add *82 or PBX dial 9 options, the pause system is not long enough to work on the network. It takes multiple strokes to do anything and the person who designed it made it so unintuitive that I have to refer to the manual repeatedly for simple actions - just too hard to remember. After 6 months I dumped the system and bought a comparable Panasonic system and it works great. Someone needs to tell RCA 9GE) to redesign this monster. I wish that I could get my money back for the total loss.
customer_reviews.author: LFMAN

customer_reviews.title: Caution: this phone is an analog phone and will ...
customer_reviews.text: Caution: this phone is an analog phone and will not work properly on today phone system which is voice over.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: THERE HAS GOT TO BE BETTER STUFF OUT THERE
customer_reviews.text: WHAT A PIECE OF HAGGIS. AS CRUMMY A PHONE AS I HAVE EVER HAD THE DISPLEASURE OF USING. THERE HAS GOT TO BE BETTER STUFF OUT THERE.
customer_reviews.author: HENRY A.

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this phone
customer_reviews.text: this product was brought brand new arrived on time but did not work at all had to pay to send this item back to the sender. who is inpossible to contact.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara White

product_meta.title: RCA 25255RE2 Dect_6.0 2-Handset 2-Line Landline Telephone,Black
product_meta.description: Model Number: 25255 2-Line Corded Cordless Expandable telephone system with answering machine that supports your home/office needs pairs wirelessly with other RCA 2-Line phones to create a system in minutes! Combine up to 10 devises together to support your office needs with features like: the dependability of a corded base with the flexibility of cordless handsets, Voicemail Waiting Indicator , the Digital Answerer with 60 minute record time, utilizing DECT 6.0 for interference-free communications , Call Waiting Caller ID with 100 Name/Number Log , Full-Duplex Speakerphone , 10 Programmable One-Touch Speed Dials , 99 Name/Number Directory , Easy-to-read backlit LCD display , Intercom with Paging Feature , 2-Line Conferencing , Do Not Disturb/Privacy Setting , Headset Jack , the display can be switched from English to Spanish or French , has Digital Volume Control, can be Desk or Wall Mounted, and is Hearing Aid Compatible with a 2 Year Warranty For customer service assistance, dial 1.800.511.3180
feature_bullets: Two-Line expandable phone system includes corded base and one DECT cordless handset with digital answering machine
Features full-duplex speakerphone allowing both parties involved in a telephone call to speak simultaneously and be heard clearly, as if they were having a face to face meeting.
2-line conferencing, plus 10 programmable one-touch speed dials
Expand your system by adding any combination of up to 10 additional cordless handsets or base units
Integrated Digital Answering System with 60 minutes of record time
Call Waiting/Caller ID with 99 Name/Number Log
Intercom capability between handsets. Compatible with other RCA 2-Line Wireless Office Products

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars167 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
